name: runtipi
tagline: A self-hosted app manager for homelab environments
description: Runtipi is a self-hosted app manager designed for homelabs. It allows users to deploy lightweight services with single commands and manage updates through a web UI.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Install popular self-hosted apps with a single command

features.title: Update Management
features.description: Keep installed apps up to date with automatic or manual updates

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Manage all your apps through a centralized browser interface

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Run apps in isolated containers for security and easy management

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Create and restore backups of app data and configurations
